name: Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition - Republic RC-3 Seabee
storyline:
Built in 1946, the unique Seabee amphibian was a product of legendary aircraft designer Percival H. Spencer.

Spencer is probably best known for selling his Air Car design to the Republic Aviation Corporation, as his contribution for the expected market boom for post-WWII personal aircraft.

Today, more than 60 years after production ended, the Seabee is still the most popular amphibian on the used market.
summary: The Republic RC-3 Seabee for Microsoft Flight Simulator X: Steam Edition includes seven high definition paint schemes and both male and female passengers.
